20namespace v8_inspector {

22namespace {
23
24bool isASCII(UChar c) { return !(c & ~0x7F); }
25
26bool isSpaceOrNewLine(UChar c) {
27 return isASCII(c) && c <= ' ' && (c == ' ' || (c <= 0xD && c >= 0x9));
28}
29
30int64_t charactersToInteger(const uint16_t* characters, size_t length,
31 bool* ok = nullptr) {
32 std::vector<char> buffer;
33 buffer.reserve(length + 1);
34 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
35 if (!isASCII(characters[i])) {
36 if (ok) *ok = false;
37 return 0;
38 }
39 buffer.push_back(static_cast<char>(characters[i]));
40 }
41 buffer.push_back('\0');
42
43 char* endptr;
44 int64_t result =
45 static_cast<int64_t>(std::strtoll(buffer.data(), &endptr, 10));
46 if (ok) *ok = !(*endptr);
47 return result;
48}
49} // namespace
50
51String16::String16(const UChar* characters, size_t size)
52 : m_impl(characters, size) {}
53String16::String16(const uint16_t* characters, size_t size)
54 : m_impl(reinterpret_cast<const UChar*>(characters), size) {}
55
56String16::String16(const UChar* characters) : m_impl(characters) {}
57
58String16::String16(const char* characters)
59 : String16(characters, std::strlen(characters)) {}
60
61String16::String16(const char* characters, size_t size) {
62 m_impl.resize(size);
63 for (size_t i = 0; i < size; ++i) m_impl[i] = characters[i];
64}
65
66String16::String16(const std::basic_string<UChar>& impl) : m_impl(impl) {}
67
68String16::String16(std::basic_string<UChar>&& impl) : m_impl(impl) {}
69
70// static
71String16 String16::fromInteger(int number) {
72 char arr[50];
73 v8::base::Vector<char> buffer(arr, arraysize(arr));
74 return String16(v8::internal::IntToCString(number, buffer));
75}
76
77// static
78String16 String16::fromInteger(size_t number) {
79 const size_t kBufferSize = 50;
80 char buffer[kBufferSize];
81#if defined(V8_OS_WIN)
82 v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%Iu", number);
83#else
84 v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%zu", number);
85#endif
86 return String16(buffer);
87}
88
89// static
90String16 String16::fromInteger64(int64_t number) {
91 char buffer[50];
92 v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, arraysize(buffer), "%" PRId64 "", number);
93 return String16(buffer);
94}
95
96// static
97String16 String16::fromDouble(double number) {
98 char arr[50];
99 v8::base::Vector<char> buffer(arr, arraysize(arr));
100 return String16(v8::internal::DoubleToCString(number, buffer));
101}
102
103// static
104String16 String16::fromDouble(double number, int precision) {
105 std::unique_ptr<char[]> str(
106 v8::internal::DoubleToPrecisionCString(number, precision));
107 return String16(str.get());
108}
109
110int64_t String16::toInteger64(bool* ok) const {
111 return charactersToInteger(characters16(), length(), ok);
112}
113
114int String16::toInteger(bool* ok) const {
115 int64_t result = toInteger64(ok);
116 if (ok && *ok) {
117 *ok = result <= std::numeric_limits<int>::max() &&
118 result >= std::numeric_limits<int>::min();
119 }
120 return static_cast<int>(result);
121}
122
123std::pair<size_t, size_t> String16::getTrimmedOffsetAndLength() const {
124 if (!length()) return std::make_pair(0, 0);
125
126 size_t start = 0;
127 size_t end = length() - 1;
128
129 // skip white space from start
130 while (start <= end && isSpaceOrNewLine(characters16()[start])) ++start;
131
132 // only white space
133 if (start > end) return std::make_pair(0, 0);
134
135 // skip white space from end
136 while (end && isSpaceOrNewLine(characters16()[end])) --end;
137
138 return std::make_pair(start, end + 1 - start);
139}
140
141String16 String16::stripWhiteSpace() const {
142 std::pair<size_t, size_t> offsetAndLength = getTrimmedOffsetAndLength();
143 if (offsetAndLength.second == 0) return String16();
144 if (offsetAndLength.first == 0 && offsetAndLength.second == length() - 1) {
145 return *this;
146 }
147 return substring(offsetAndLength.first, offsetAndLength.second);
148}
149
150String16Builder::String16Builder() = default;
151
152void String16Builder::append(const String16& s) {
153 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), s.characters16(),
154 s.characters16() + s.length());
155}
156
157void String16Builder::append(UChar c) { m_buffer.push_back(c); }
158
159void String16Builder::append(char c) {
160 UChar u = c;
161 m_buffer.push_back(u);
162}
163
164void String16Builder::append(const UChar* characters, size_t length) {
165 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), characters, characters + length);
166}
167
168void String16Builder::append(const char* characters, size_t length) {
169 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), characters, characters + length);
170}
171
172void String16Builder::appendNumber(int number) {
173 constexpr int kBufferSize = 11;
174 char buffer[kBufferSize];
175 int chars = v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%d", number);
176 DCHECK_LE(0, chars);
177 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), buffer, buffer + chars);
178}
179
180void String16Builder::appendNumber(size_t number) {
181 constexpr int kBufferSize = 20;
182 char buffer[kBufferSize];
183#if defined(V8_OS_WIN)
184 int chars = v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%Iu", number);
185#else
186 int chars = v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%zu", number);
187#endif
188 DCHECK_LE(0, chars);
189 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), buffer, buffer + chars);
190}
191
192void String16Builder::appendUnsignedAsHex(uint64_t number) {
193 constexpr int kBufferSize = 17;
194 char buffer[kBufferSize];
195 int chars =
196 v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%016" PRIx64, number);
197 DCHECK_LE(0, chars);
198 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), buffer, buffer + chars);
199}
200
201void String16Builder::appendUnsignedAsHex(uint32_t number) {
202 constexpr int kBufferSize = 9;
203 char buffer[kBufferSize];
204 int chars = v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%08" PRIx32, number);
205 DCHECK_LE(0, chars);
206 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), buffer, buffer + chars);
207}
208
209void String16Builder::appendUnsignedAsHex(uint8_t number) {
210 constexpr int kBufferSize = 3;
211 char buffer[kBufferSize];
212 int chars = v8::base::OS::SNPrintF(buffer, kBufferSize, "%02" PRIx8, number);
213 DCHECK_LE(0, chars);
214 m_buffer.insert(m_buffer.end(), buffer, buffer + chars);
215}
216
217String16 String16Builder::toString() {
218 return String16(m_buffer.data(), m_buffer.size());
219}
220
221void String16Builder::reserveCapacity(size_t capacity) {
222 m_buffer.reserve(capacity);
223}
224
225String16 String16::fromUTF8(const char* stringStart, size_t length) {
226 return String16(UTF8ToUTF16(stringStart, length));
227}
228
229String16 String16::fromUTF16LE(const UChar* stringStart, size_t length) {
230#ifdef V8_TARGET_BIG_ENDIAN
231 // Need to flip the byte order on big endian machines.
232 String16Builder builder;
233 builder.reserveCapacity(length);
234 for (size_t i = 0; i < length; i++) {
235 const UChar utf16be_char =
236 stringStart[i] << 8 | (stringStart[i] >> 8 & 0x00FF);
237 builder.append(utf16be_char);
238 }
239 return builder.toString();
240#else
241 // No need to do anything on little endian machines.
242 return String16(stringStart, length);
243#endif // V8_TARGET_BIG_ENDIAN
244}
245
246String16 String16::fromUTF16LE(const uint16_t* stringStart, size_t length) {
247 return fromUTF16LE(reinterpret_cast<const UChar*>(stringStart), length);
248}
249
250std::string String16::utf8() const {
251 return UTF16ToUTF8(m_impl.data(), m_impl.size());
252}
253
